title: Create HZRPC fundraising recommendations Word doc
description: Create a nicely formatted Word document of the HZRPC youth soccer fundraising recommendations. Include links to grant programs. Cover all 4 top recommendations (corporate sponsorship, grant applications, sponsor a player, GiveBacks shop-to-give) plus other ideas. Email to daveh@outlook.com when done.

actions.note: Requested by Dave via email reply. No rush.
Word doc created with full recommendations, 8 grant programs, sponsorship guide, GiveBacks guide, and 10 additional ideas. Emailed to daveh@outlook.com via Fastmail with attachment.
